mapper.insert: insert into post (user_code, subject, content, type, views) value (#{userCode}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{type}, 0)
mapper.select: select p.post_id, p.user_code, u.name, p.subject, p.content, p.type, p.regtime, p.views from post p join user u on p.user_code = u.user_code order by p.regtime
select p.post_id, p.user_code, u.name, p.subject, p.content, p.type, p.regtime, p.views from post p join user u on p.user_code = u.user_code where p.post_id = #{postId}
